courses.title: The complete advanced 6-week UI/UX design bootcamp
courses.description: Our 6-week UI/UX bootcamp equips students with the essential skills to become successful designers. Our experienced instructors provide hands-on learning opportunities to design and prototype digital products, conduct user research, and create user flows and wireframes.

courses.title: Mastering Frontend Development with React and Vue
courses.description: This 8-week course focuses on the fundamentals of frontend development using React and Vue. You will learn how to build modern, performant web applications with hands-on projects that simulate real-world scenarios.
